website_summaries.verdict: A little on the expensive side, but we highly recommend this tray table to those who need to retrofit their existing furniture for elderly or mobility-challenged users. Assembly may be challenging, however.
pros: 30-pound capacity for tray, 250 pounds for handle
Bamboo tray table easy to maintain
cons: Can be difficult to rotate, not completely level
Not designed for temporary or freestanding use

customer_reviews.title: Table top is slanted
customer_reviews.text: The table is well made and sturdy. Durable and holds a male adult putting all his weight on it to stand up utilizing the "handle" The only problem is the table is not level, its slanted towards the chair when its positioned over your lap. It's quite awkward and hard to use. While eating or typing you just want to twist it to be level. Not sure I would purchase again due to this slant, it definitely throws the whole thing off, other then that it would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W.

customer_reviews.title: A very worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and has helped my husband tremendously. Added the cup holder and the tray is a great place for his beverage and reading material as he stretches out his bad hip after a long day of work. Some reviews complained that the tray wasn't level, but they must have missed the part in the instructions that indicates the easy steps for leveling the tray top. Ours also swings fairly easily, but not too easily. A very worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Old McMalmberg

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but do your homework b4 ordering.
customer_reviews.text: Made well. Good raw materials. Good welds. Good paint. End of good. Designer needs to do more research on potential uses and fits. Product description states it works on LIFT chairs. More research needed before making an "All inclusive" statement. Better to say "SOME LIFT CHAIRS-you must check dimensions before ordering" I had to build a significant floor framework assembly to shift vertical post far enough to the right to clear chair armrest during the "lift" cycle. And now 2.5 months later table top is splitting on lamination joints. I will need to eventially recover it with a covering and I'll choose something less slippery.
customer_reviews.author: PVFMN

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product!
customer_reviews.text: This took a whopping 10 minutes to put together. (The hardest part was lifting the sofa to secure it under the legs.) The instructions are clearly written in English, with good illustrations. It's sturdy and stable, and works just as described. We are delighted! Please note: the organizer accessory is problematic. At one of the height adjustments of this product, the organizer covers the height adjustment button, making it very difficult to access. The cup holder and side tray are just fine.

customer_reviews.title: Near Perfect. Best I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a few such stands designed for using a laptop while sitting in a comfortable chair or sofa, and this one is by far my favorite. Because of its unique design, the table can sit lower to your lap, making it much more comfortable to use. And if you prefer it to be higher, it’s easy to change. One recommendation I’d make is to be able to tilt the table for even greater comfort. Though I did find a way around that issue by purchasing a very nice adjustable laptop stand.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy! Not strong/waste of money!

It's just very uncomfortable. I hope this makes sense to the readers. It is also a little wobbly. I'm returning this as it's just not worth the price.

My only concern is that the assembly under the table top hangs pretty low and has square edges that might cause scrapes or bruises on older legs. If you’re worried about this, it could easily be solved with some foam insulation or rubber bumper of sorts. All in all, very sturdy and aesthetically pleasing piece of furniture that helps improve quality of life big time!

The table itself is terrific -- exactly what we wanted for my husband post-surgery. It would definitely have rated five stars plus if we hadn't had to replace the one part.

customer_reviews.title: So far I like it!

The table can't be tilted. When sitting in a chair they are built so you tip back so the tray needs to tip forward or you have to lean forward to use it. I wish that changed. But there is no way to tilt the tray forward. I love that I can swivel it out of the way!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Buchholz

customer_reviews.title: Making my recovery easier
customer_reviews.text: My husband put the sofa on risers (5 inches) and then slide this in next to wear I sit. The knob like handle is easy to use and non slip. I can indepently rise from the sofa without help and feel very secure, making the transfer to the walker a breeze. After bilateral knee replacements this is so much safer than I had ever hoped for. The tray table is sturdy, holding a small basket of medications, a coffee cup and my notebook. I recommend if you would like some independence with getting up from a seated position and I think my PT would agree.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and helpful

product_meta.title: Stander Omni Tray Table, Work from Home Computer Desk, Laptop Lap Desk Station, Bamboo Swivel TV Tray with Ergonomic Stand Assist Mobility Handle
product_meta.description: The Omni Tray Table from Stander gives you both the convenience of a TV table and the safety of a mobility handle in one product, keeping you happy and healthy. The Omni Tray features a large bamboo tray table that is perfect for using your laptop, eating dinner, or reading a favorite book. When not in use simply pivot the tabletop to the side and use as a couch side table that blends in with the rest of your living room furniture. The ergonomic mobility handle gives you the leverage and support needed when sitting down or standing up from your favorite couch, lift chair, or recliner safely and independently. Whether you have recently had surgery or simply lack the same mobility you once had, the Omni Tray is the functional and attractive tray table you have been looking for.
feature_bullets: OVERSIZED LAP DESK: Our multi-use bamboo TV tray table measures 20 by 15 inches, providing plenty of room to be used as a home computer desk, writing desk, or laptop stand; ideal for those who work from home or for students with online coursework; with 360 degrees of swivel motion, easily pivot the tray table out of the way when not in use; safely supports up to 30 pounds

PROVIDES BALANCE AND SUPPORT: Stander’s ergonomic safety handle provides balance and support when sitting and standing from your favorite couch, lift chair, or recliner; our mobility handle can support up to 250 pounds

HIGH QUALITY AND EASY TO ASSEMBLE: Easily assemble and securely install the adjustable Omni Tray Table under the feet of most four legged couches, lift chairs, or recliners with feet 25 to 35 inches apart; each tray includes all the needed equipment for assembly, no additional tools required; not intended for freestanding use

FULLY ADJUSTABLE: Customize the Omni Tray to your individual comfort and furniture; tray height adjusts from 24 to 32 inches; support handle height adjusts from 28 to 36 inches; base length adjusts from 25 to 35 inches; please reference our assembly video and infographics to determine if the Omni Tray Table is compatible with your furniture
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: All Stander products are backed by our Lifetime Satisfaction Guarantee
